onboardingScreen.firstScreenSubTitle: Which bus goes where you want to go? What time does it depart? It's all at your fingertips.
onboardingScreen.secondScreenTitle: Which bus goes between two stops?
onboardingScreen.secondScreenSubTitle: Choose your starting and destination points and instantly find out which buses are passing by.
onboardingScreen.thirdScreenSubTitle: Contribute by adding stops that are actually there but not in the application in a few steps.
